package.name: xdot
package.description:
XDot.py, by Jose Fonseca, is an interactive viewer for graphs written in Graphviz's dot language.
This package adds front-end capabilities to XDot including WX Widget support and experimental Qt support and a mechanism for receiving callbacks when nodes are clicked. This extension is provided as BSD.
